did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Duke University. Office of Public Affairs and Government Relations. Faculty Newsletter

did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: The collection contains news clippings from local publications on the newsletter, proposed articles, correspondence, and a readership survey.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the University Archives to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright for official university records is held by Duke University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], in the Faculty NewLetter Records, 1991-1994, Duke University Archives, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: Duke University Academic Council, Duke University Office of the Provost Transfer, July 2013

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Finding aid derived from MARC record, November 2014

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Duke Faculty Newsletter was distributed as a stand-alone publication from 1979-1986. Post-1986, the newletter was published as an insert within the campus publication Duke Dialogue. Editorially independent, the newsletter received its funding from the Office of Public Affairs and Governmental Relations.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The collection contains news clippings from local publications on the newsletter, proposed articles, correspondence, and a readership survey.

note.label: General note
note.p: In off-site storage; 24 hours advance notice may be required for use.
